item.title: Why Markets Are Getting Anxious About the Fed
item.description: The central bank is widely expected to lower its benchmark lending rate on Wednesday. But investors are worried about what comes afterward.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Bernhard Warner, Sarah Kessler, Michael J. de la Merced, Niko Gallogly, Brian O’Keefe and Eli Tan
item.media:credit: Caroline Gutman for The New York Times
item.media:description: The shadow of President Trump could loom over Jay Powell, the Fed chair, at today’s meeting.

item.title: Nvidia’s China Lobbying Wins Big. But the True Payoff is Less Certain.
item.description: President Trump’s move fulfills a major goal of the chipmaker. But the move faces opposition in Washington — and uncertainty in Beijing.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Bernhard Warner, Sarah Kessler, Michael J. de la Merced, Niko Gallogly, Brian O’Keefe and Ian Mount
item.media:credit: Pete Marovich for The New York Times
item.media:description: Lobbying efforts by Jensen Huang, C.E.O. of Nvidia, appear to have paid off in a big way.

item.title: Trump Looms Over Netflix’s Deal for Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: President Trump said the acquisition “could be a problem,” suggesting he will insert himself into the regulatory review of the transaction.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Bernhard Warner, Sarah Kessler, Michael J. de la Merced, Niko Gallogly, Brian O’Keefe and Vivienne Walt
item.media:credit: Valerie Plesch for The New York Times
item.media:description: President Trump has spoken out on Netflix’s bid to buy Warner Bros. Discovery.

item.title: Sign Up for DealBook
item.description: Make sense of the latest business and policy headlines with our daily newsletter.
item.dc:creator: The New York Times

item.title: DealBook Summit: Reckoning with the ‘New Normal’
item.description: At this year’s DealBook Summit, there was an understanding that in the Trump era, business runs through the White house like never before.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin

item.title: From the DealBook Summit: Industry Leaders Share Their Insights
item.description: Representing a variety of public and private sectors, guests from technology and finance to education and the artsparticipated in a lunchtime discussion designed to spark conversation around critical questions of the day.
item.dc:creator: The New York Times
item.media:credit: Karsten Moran for The New York Times
item.media:description: Experts in business and politics gathered last week at the DealBook Summit in New York.

item.title: DealBook Summit: In a Tumultuous Era, Global Alliances and Practices Are Upended
item.description: While President Trump has made positive moves, panelists on a DealBook task force pointed to Ukraine, Venezuela and, especially, China as serious missteps.
item.dc:creator: Julie Ho
item.media:credit: Nicole Craine for The New York Times
item.media:description: Participants in a task force titled “The Global Reorder” included, from left, Samantha Power, Ehud Barak, Senator Chris Coons, Nicholas Kristof, Dr. Mark T. Esper, Fareed Zakaria, Avril Haines and David H. Petraeus.

item.title: DealBook Summit: Business Executives Share Tips for Leadership
item.description: Executives on a DealBook Summit task force panel said fear was not the way to build teams capable of navigating difficult times.
item.dc:creator: Leslie Wayne
item.media:credit: Shuran Huang for The New York Times
item.media:description: Participants in a task force titled “The New Rules for Leadership” included, from left, Alex Chriss, Beth Ford, Bob Jordan, David Brooks, Ynon Kreiz, Emma Walmsley and Pete Nordstrom.

item.title: A DealBook Task Force Grapples With Media Trust and Biases
item.description: Legacy journalists on a DealBook Summit panel warned about interference from President Trump, while panelists from new media said he is just the “coroner” for a field that had already lost credibility.
item.dc:creator: Katie Robertson
item.media:credit: Nicole Craine for The New York Times
item.media:description: Participants in a DealBook task force panel had a lively debate about trust and the media. From left, Amna Nawaz, Charlamagne tha God, Ben Shapiro, the moderator Michael Barbaro, Jon Favreau, Andrew Schulz, Stephanie Ruhle and David Remnick.

item.title: DealBook Summit: Education Leaders Feel the Weight of Preparing Graduates for a New World
item.description: Leaders of colleges and universities on a panel at the DealBook Summit said other challenges they face include government pressure and preparing graduates for a new world.
item.dc:creator: Alina Tugend
item.media:credit: Nicole Craine for The New York Times
item.media:description: Seven presidents and chancellors gathered at last week’s DealBook Summit task force on higher education: from left, Carmen Twillie Ambar, Sian Leah Beilock, Jonathan Levin, the panel moderator Jodi Kantor, Ron Daniels, John B. King, Daniel Diermeier and James Harris.

item.title: Does the Job of C.E.O. or Private Investor Come First? Intel’s Chief Is Juggling That Question.
item.description: Lip-Bu Tan, who was appointed chief executive of Intel in March, is also a longtime venture capitalist. His dual roles have caused some consternation.
item.dc:creator: Don Clark and Tripp Mickle
item.media:description: Lip-Bu Tan, the chief executive of Intel, has led a venture capital firm since 1987.

item.title: Why the A.I. Boom Is Unlike the Dot-Com Boom
item.description: Silicon Valley is again betting everything on a new technology. But the mania is not a reboot of the late-1990s frenzy.
item.dc:creator: David Streitfeld
item.media:description: Ben Horowitz, a major A.I. venture capitalist, in 2019. “The clearest sign that we are not actually in a bubble is the fact that everyone is talking about a bubble,” he said.

item.title: The New Rules for Leadership
item.description: As artificial intelligence, politics and market volatility reshape business, top C.E.O.s share how they balance purpose, performance and the pressures of modern leadership.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Listen: CEOs From Warby Parker, Under Armour and More on Grappling With Innovation
item.description: As technology accelerates and pressures mount, top executives grapple with purpose, innovation and resilience and what leadership means now.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Todd Combs Leaves Berkshire Hathaway for JPMorgan Chase as Buffett Nears Retirement
item.description: The departure of the senior stock picker was one of several leadership changes ahead of Mr. Buffett’s planned departure as chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway.
item.dc:creator: Michael J. de la Merced
item.media:description: Todd Combs joined Berkshire Hathaway in 2010 to become one of the managers of the trillion-dollar conglomerate’s vast stock portfolio.

item.title: The Education of Higher Education
item.description: As political pressure mounts and campuses face new cultural and financial strains, higher education confronts a test of purpose and survival.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: The Global Re-Order
item.description: As U.S. policies upend old alliances and norms, global power is shifting and the stakes are growing.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Dario Amodei on the Risk of an A.I. Bubble, Regulation and A.G.I.
item.description: The Anthropic chief executive spoke with Andrew Ross Sorkin at the DealBook Summit.
item.dc:creator: Sarah Kessler
item.media:description: Andrew interviewing Dario Amodei, the C.E.O. of Anthropic, at the 2025 DealBook Summit.

item.title: Scott Bessent on Tariffs, the Fed and the Economy
item.description: The U.S. treasury secretary spoke with Andrew Ross Sorkin at the DealBook Summit on Wednesday.
item.dc:creator: Sarah Kessler
item.media:credit: Karsten Moran for The New York Times
item.media:description: Andrew interviews U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent at the 2025 DealBook Summit.

item.title: Listen: Ben Shapiro, Andrew Schulz, Stephanie Ruhle and Others on Journalism’s Future
item.description: Media leaders debate how trust eroded, what audiences want now, and whether traditional journalism can still compete with personality-driven voices.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Why the Battle for Warner Bros. Discovery May Not Be Over Yet
item.description: Netflix struck a deal to buy one of Hollywood’s most storied studios. But a scorned rival, and the Trump administration, may put up a fight.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Bernhard Warner, Sarah Kessler, Michael J. de la Merced, Niko Gallogly, Brian O’Keefe and Grady McGregor
item.media:description: The fierce bidding war for Warner Bros. Discovery has taken a decisive turn.

item.title: Taiwan’s Leader Warns China Is Getting More Aggressive
item.description: President Lai Ching-te is calling for more military spending.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: MrBeast Isn’t Looking for Controversy
item.description: YouTube’s most popular entertainer reflects on the creator economy.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Halle Berry’s Journey to Being a Women’s Health Advocate
item.description: The actor shares how a misdiagnosis sparked her to take on the cause of raising awareness about menopause.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Anthropic Chief Executive Has A.I. Bubble ‘Concerns’
item.description: Dario Amodei discusses the risk of investing too much in data centers vs. not enough.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: G.M.’s Chief Executive Remains Bullish on Fuel-Efficient Motors
item.description: Mary Barra of General Motors says her company will continue investing in more fuel-efficient cars, regardless of Trump administration policies.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Larry Fink and Brian Armstrong Are Not Worried About Another Crypto Winter
item.description: The chief executives of BlackRock and Coinbase discuss why they believe the future of crypto is bright.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Alex Karp Defends Palantir’s Work With ICE
item.description: Palantir’s chief executive rejects claims that President Trump is a fascist as “stupid.”
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Netanyahu Is Defiant In Face Of Legal Challenges
item.description: Israel’s prime minister says he’s not yet done with his mission, and discusses how strength leads to peace.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Erika Kirk on Why She Forgave Her Husband’s Killer
item.description: Ms. Kirk talks about how faith guides her journey and her plans for Turning Point USA.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Newsom Says Trump’s Attacks Are “Not Normal Behavior”
item.description: The California governor also criticizes executives he says are engaging in “crony capitalism.”
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo and Katie McMurran

item.title: Scott Bessent’s Tariff Evolution
item.description: The Treasury Secretary says he’s changed his mind on tariffs since 2024, when he was a skeptic.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Evan Roberts, Julie Zann, Dan Powell, Kelly Pieklo, Katie McMurran and Brian O’Keefe

item.title: Newsom, Kirk, A.I., Trump and Other DealBook Summit Highlights
item.description: The economy, inflation, tariffs, bubble fears, crypto and other big topics that made headlines this year.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Bernhard Warner, Sarah Kessler, Michael J. de la Merced, Niko Gallogly, Brian O’Keefe, Ian Mount and Aimee Ortiz
item.media:credit: Dave Sanders for The New York Times
item.media:description: Gavin Newsom, the governor of California, voiced his criticism of President Trump — and the business world’s deepening ties to his administration.

item.title: Harvey, a Maker of A.I. Legal Software, Raises $160 Million
item.description: The start-up is now valued at about $8 billion as it pushes to add new customers, including those outside law firms.
item.dc:creator: Michael J. de la Merced
